verbs.description: WHISTLER , British Columbia ( AP ) - [ARG0: Canada 's finance minister] [V: says] [ARG1: a meeting of officials of the seven major industrial countries will now be focused on trade after U.S President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on steel and aluminum imports on America 's allies] .

WHISTLER , British Columbia ( AP ) - Canada 's finance minister says a meeting of officials of the seven major industrial countries [V: will] now be focused on trade after U.S President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on steel and aluminum imports on America 's allies .

WHISTLER , British Columbia ( AP ) - Canada 's finance minister says a meeting of officials of the seven major industrial countries will now [V: be] focused on trade after U.S President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on steel and aluminum imports on America 's allies .
